name: Paralyze
note:
<Category: Ailment>

<Reapply Ignore Turns>
// Disables instant skills from paralyze as to not abuse the mechanic.
<Cancel Instant Skill: 1 to 2000>
<Cancel Instant Item: 1 to 2000>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
// Set the paralyze success rate.
var paralyzeRate = 0.5;
// Make a random number check to see if paralyze passes...
if (Math.random() < paralyzeRate) {
  // If it does, play the paralyze animation on the target.
  user.startAnimation(64);
  // Check for the user's current action...
  if (user.currentAction()) {
    // And make the user consume its resources.
    user.useItem(user.currentAction().item());
  }
  // Clear the user's actions making the user lose the actions.
  user.clearActions();
  // Get the log window from battle.
  var logWindow = SceneManager._scene._logWindow;
  // Check if the paralyze state has text in message 3
  if (state.message3) {
    // If it does, create a message based on it.
    var msg = '<CENTER>' + user.name() + state.message3;
    // Add the text to the log window to display in battle.
    logWindow.addText(msg);
  }
  // Make the battle wait for the paralysis animation to finish playing.
  BattleManager.actionWaitForAnimation();
  // Clear the log window.
  logWindow.push('clear');
}
</Custom Action Start Effect>

<Help Description>
: Unit has \c[17]50% chance\c[0] of failing to act. Unit's \i[446]\c[17]Instant Cast\c[0] properties are also disabled.
</Help Description>

message4: lost the effects of the repellant.

<Custom Apply Effect>
target._deathMarkDmg = 0;
target.setStateCounter(stateId, target._deathMarkDmg);

<Custom React Effect>
if (value > 0 && user === origin && this.isHpEffect()) {
  target._deathMarkDmg += value/2;
  target._deathMarkDmg = Math.round(target._deathMarkDmg);
  target.setStateCounter(stateId, target._deathMarkDmg);
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Leave Effect>
target.startAnimation(221);
var dmg = Math.round(target._deathMarkDmg);
dmg *= 100/(100 + target.mdf/2);
dmg = Math.floor(dmg);
target.gainHp(-dmg);
target._deathMarkDmg = 0;
target.startDamagePopup();
target.clearResult();
target.removeStateCounter(stateId);
</Custom Leave Effect>

<Help Description>

\c[18]all damage\c[0] taken from source while mark was active.
</Help Description>

name: Ethereal Chains
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
// Sets the counter on the state to 5.
user.setStateCounter(stateId, 5);
// Determine the damage of the roots being cut.
user._thornBindDmg = origin.mat * 1.5;
// Determine the maximum cap of the damage.
user._thornBindDmg = Math.min(user._thornBindDmg, 1000);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
// Get the result of the target.
var result = target.result();
// Check if the target is hit, alive, the action is physical, and dealing damage.
if (result.isHit() && !target.isDead() && this.isPhysical() && this.isDamage()) {
  // Play animation on target.
  target.startAnimation(7);
  // Get the amount of damage dealt.
  var dmg = target._thornBindDmg || 1;
  // Make the target lose HP.
  target.gainHp(-dmg);
  // Disable critical hit effects.
  target.result().critical = false;
  // Start the damage popup.
  target.startDamagePopup();
  // Clear the result.
  target.clearResult();
  // Change the counter on the state to drop by 1.
  target.addStateCounter(stateId, -1);
  // Check if the counter has reached 0.
  if (target.getStateCounter(stateId) <= 0) {
    // Remove the state.
    target.removeState(stateId);
  }
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

<Help Description>
: Next \c[18]5 Physical Attacks\c[0] taken by unit will deal extra \c[17]neutral\c[0] damage.
</Help Description>

name: Thorn Scales
note:
<Custom React Effect>
// Check to see if any physical damage is dealt.
if (value > 0 && this.isPhysical()) {
  // Sets the Recoil Rate to 15%.
  var rate = 0.5;
  // Determines the amount of recoil damage dealt.
  var recoil = value * rate;
  // Sets the DEF bonus rate to 15%.
  var rate = 0.2;
  // Determines the amount of bonus damage dealt.
  var bonus = target.def * rate;
  // Rounds up the bonus damage and recoil damage.
  var dmg = Math.ceil(bonus + recoil);
  // Makes the attacker lose damage equal to the dmg variable.
  user.gainHp(-1 * dmg);
  // Check to see if the attacker is dead.
  if (user.isDead()) {
    // If the attacker is dead, make it collapse.
    user.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Help Description>
: Reflects \c[17]15% \c[0](Plus \c[17]15% of Defence\c[0]) of all \c[18]Physical Damage\c[0] taken.
</Help Description>

name: Statikk
note:
<State Animation: 242>
<Custom Apply Effect>
user.setStateCounter(stateId, 5);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Confirm Effect>
// Check if this is a basic attack and that the user and target are on different teams.
if (this.isPhysical() && this.isForOne() && target.isActor() !== user.isActor()) {
    // Determine the thunder element ID used for shock.
    var elementId = 4;
    // Damage formula used for the shock effect.
    var damage = 100 + user.atk * 1.2 + user.mat * 1.2;
    // Check if a critical hit landed.
    if (target.result().critical) {
      // Apply critical damage.
      damage = this.applyCritical(damage);
    }
     damage *= (1 + user.elementAmplifyRate(elementId));
     damage *= 100/(100 + target.mdf/2);
    // Get all of the alive members from the opponent's unit.
    var members = this.opponentsUnit().aliveMembers();
    // Remove the main target from the member list.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
    // Play the shock animation on the target.
    target.startAnimation(77);
    // Increase the damage received by the shock damage with the thunder multiplier.
    if (value > 0) {
    value += Math.ceil(damage * target.elementRate(elementId));
    }
    // 4 other members of the opposite team need to be shocked.
    var extraTargets = 2;
    // Loop each of these 4 members.
    while (extraTargets--) {
      // Get a random member from the opponent's team.
      var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
      // Check if the member exists.
      if (member) {
        // Play the shock animation on the random member.
        member.startAnimation(77);
        // Make the random member take damage with the thunder multiplier.
        member.gainHp(-Math.ceil(damage * member.elementRate(elementId)));
        // Start the damage popup on the random member.
        member.startDamagePopup();
        // Clear the random member's results.
        member.clearResult();
        // Remove the random member from the list of valid targets.
        members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
        // Check if the member is dead.
        if (member.isDead()) {
          // If the member is dead, have it collapse.
          member.performCollapse();
        }
      }
    }
  }
</Custom Confirm Effect>

<Custom Establish Effect>
if (this.isPhysical() && this.isForOne() && target.isActor() !== user.isActor()) {
// Increase the state counter by 6.
  user.addStateCounter(stateId, -1);
  // Check if the counter is full (at 100).
  if (user.getStateCounter(stateId) <= 0) {
    // Clear the state counter.
    user.removeStateCounter(stateId);
    user.removeState(stateId);
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

<Help Description>
: \c[17]Single Target Physical Attacks Discharge\c[0] to upto 2 nearby enemies, dealing additional \c[17]Lightning Damage\c[0].
</Help Description>

name: Ignite
note:
<Reapply Ignore Turns>
<Custom Apply Effect>
// Make sure the stack count exists.
target._stackingBlight = target._stackingBlight || 0;
// Increase the stack count.
target._stackingBlight += 1;
// Set Stack Count
var blightstacks = target._stackingBlight.clamp(0, 6);
// Show Stacks
target.setStateCounter(stateId, 'x' + blightstacks);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Check to see if the effect is a leave effect or removal.
var notLeaveEffect = !$gameTemp._customLeaveEffectEval;
// Make sure the stack count exists.
if (notLeaveEffect) {
target._stackingBlight = target._stackingBlight || 0;
// Sets the maximum amount of stacks to 6.
var blightstacks = Math.min(6, target._stackingBlight);
// The damage formula used per tick.
var element = 2;
var damage = (100 + blightstacks * origin.mat * 4) * (1 + origin.elementAmplifyRate(element));
damage *= target.elementRate(element);
damage *= 100/(100 + target.mdf/2);
damage = Math.floor(damage);
// Play poison animation on the target.
target.startAnimation(66);
// Target takes HP damage.
target.gainHp(-damage);

// Play the popup.
target.startDamagePopup();
// Clear the results.
target.clearResult();
// Check if the target is dead.
if (target.isDead()) {
  //Check for overkill
  if (damage >= 2 * target.mhp) {
   target.startAnimation(260);
   }
  // If the target is dead, make it collapse.
  target.performCollapse();
  }
}
target._stackingBlight = undefined;
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Custom Regenerate Effect>
// Get the Fire element.
var elementId = 2;
// Make sure the stack count exists.
target._stackingBlight = target._stackingBlight || 1;
// Sets the maximum amount of stacks to 6.
var blightstacks = Math.min(6, target._stackingBlight);
// The damage formula used per tick.
var damage = blightstacks * 80 * (1 + origin.elementAmplifyRate(elementId));
// Damage multiplier for weakness/resistance to Fire element.
damage *= target.elementRate(elementId);
damage = Math.floor(damage);
// Play poison animation on the target.
target.startAnimation(67);
// Target takes HP damage.
target.gainHp(-damage);
// Play the popup.
target.startDamagePopup();
// Clear the results.
target.clearResult();
// Check if the target is dead.
if (target.isDead()) {
  // If the target is dead, make it collapse.
  target.performCollapse();
}
</Custom Regenerate Effect>

<Help Description>
: Unit takes \c[18]80 Burn Damage\c[0] per stack per turn.
</Help Description>

name: Observe
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
this._turnPhase = this._turnPhase || 0;
var logWindow = SceneManager._scene._logWindow;
if (this._turnPhase <= 1) {
var msg = '<CENTER>' + '??? is observing';
} else {
var msg = '<CENTER>' + '??? is struggling';
}
var waitFrames = 60;
logWindow.addText(msg);
this._turnPhase += 1;
//BattleManager._actionList.push(['WAIT', [waitFrames]]);
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: LeoRotate
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
if (target.isActor() && target.actorId() === 10) {
 target.setBattlerImage('LeoFutureRot');
}
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
if (target.isActor() && target.actorId() === 10) {
 target.setBattlerImage('LeoFuture');
}
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: Stored Power
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
user._storedPower = user._storedPower || 0;
user.setStateCounter(stateId, user._storedPower);
</Custom Apply Effect>

name: Trick
note:
<Custom React Effect>
if (origin.isAlive() && this.isForOne() && this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
  target.gainBarrier(value, 0);
  var group = target.friendsUnit().members();
  for (var i = 0; i < group.length; i++) {
  group[i].gainBarrier(value, 0);
  }
var text = '<CENTER>' + '\\c[17]Trick\\c[0] was successful!';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
text = '<CENTER>' + target.name() + ' and their allies gained a shield!';
SceneManager._scene._logWindow._lines.push(text);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.refresh();
var waitframes = 90;
BattleManager._actionList.push(['WAIT', [waitframes]]);
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
if (origin.isDead() || (this.isHpEffect() && value > 0)) {
  target.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: Actor State
note:
<Custom React Effect>
 var multiplier = 1;
if (user.isStateAffected(72)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.beast);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(73)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.winged);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(74)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.undead);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(75)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.armored);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(76)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.human);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(77)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.demihuman);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(78)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.crustacean);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(79)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.apodous);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(80)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.aquatic);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(81)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.plant);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(82)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.spirit);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(83)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.insect);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(84)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.dragon);
}
if (user.isStateAffected(85)) {
 multiplier *= (1 - target.neutral);
}

var reduction = Math.max(0.5, multiplier);
value *= reduction;
value = Math.floor(value);
</Custom React Effect>

<hideIcon>

name: Wind Shroud
note:
<Element Amplify 7: +30%>
<State Animation: 282>
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
if (user.barrierPoints() <= 0) {
  user.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

<Help Description>
: Unit has \c[17]+30%\c[0] \c[3]Wind Proficiency\c[0]. State persists as long as 
unit has any shield active.
</Help Description>

name: Slayer
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
user._slayStacks = user._slayStacks || 0;
user._slayStacks += 1;
var slayCount = user._slayStacks.clamp(0, 3)
if (slayCount === 2 && !user.isStateAffected(104)) {
  user.addState(104);
} 
if (slayCount === 3 && !user.isStateAffected(105)) {
  user.addState(105);
}
var critBoost = slayCount * 15;
user.setStateCounter(stateId, '+' + critBoost + '%');
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
user._slayStacks = undefined;
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Help Description>
: Unit has \c[17]+15% Critical Strike Chance\c[0] per stack. Removed after battle.
</Help Description>

 target.addState(109);

name: Aqua Mine
note:
<Cannot Select: Skill 61>

<Custom Apply Effect>
target._aquaMineDamage = target._aquaMineDamage || 0;
target.setStateCounter(stateId, '+' + target._aquaMineDamage);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
if (this.isMagical() && value > 0 && target.isActor() !== user.isActor()) {
  target._aquaMineDamage += value;
  target.setStateCounter(stateId, '+' + target._aquaMineDamage);
} else if (this.isPhysical() && value > 0 && target.isActor() !== user.isActor()) {
  var aquaDamage = 50 + origin.mat * 3; // Damage Formula
  aquaDamage += target._aquaMineDamage;
  var elementId = 5; // Water Element
  aquaDamage *= (1 + origin.elementAmplifyRate(elementId));
  aquaDamage *= user.elementRate(elementId);
  aquaDamage *= 100/(100 + user.mdf/2);
  aquaDamage = Math.floor(aquaDamage);

  user.startAnimation(278); // Damage Animation

  user.gainHp(-aquaDamage);

  user.startDamagePopup();

  user.clearResult();

  if (user.isDead()) {
  if (aquaDamage >= 2 * user.mhp) {
   user.startAnimation(260);
   }
  user.performCollapse();
  }
  target.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
target.removeStateCounter(stateId);
target._aquaMineDamage = undefined;
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Help Description>
: Unit has an Aqua Mine attached to it (persists after battle). Mine is strengthened by Magic Attacks and 
detonated by a Physical Hit.
</Help Description>
